title: Catalytic engineering of transition metal (TM: Ni, Pd, Pt)-coordinated Ge-doped graphitic carbon nitride (Ge@g-c3n4) nanostructures for petroleum hydrocarbon separation: An outlook from theoretical calculations
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Temple O. Arikpo, Michael O. Odey, Daniel C. Agurokpon, Daniel G. Malu, Alpha O. Gulack, Terkumbur E. Gber
